data.name: assetGuid
data.description: Asset GUID to update

data.name: assetOpts
data.description: Asset details

data.name: precision
data.description: Digits precision for this asset. Range is 0 to 8

data.name: symbol
data.description: Symbol up to 8 characters in length in ASCII

data.name: maxsupply
data.description: Maximum satoshis for supply. Range is 1 to 1 quintillion (10^18)

data.name: description
data.description: Description in ASCII describing token. The description will be encoded via JSON in the pubdata field for the asset and will be in the 'desc' field of the JSON object

data.name: contract
data.description: ERC20 address of the contract connected to this SPT for use in the SysEthereum bridge

data.name: updatecapabilityflags
data.description: Defaults to 127 or ALL capabilities. Update capabilities on this asset. Read more  [  _here_ ](types/#updatecapabilityflags)

data.name: notarykeyid
data.description: Notary KeyID, the hash160 of the address used for notarization. Should be P2WPKH

data.name: notarydetails
data.description: Details related to the notarization of transactions using this asset

data.name: endpoint
data.description: Fully qualified URL of the notary endpoint. The endpoint will be sent a POST request with the transaction hex and some other details in a JSON object and requires a signature signing the transaction following notarization protocol

data.name: instanttransfers
data.description: Default is 0 (false). Instant transfers by blocking double-spends from inputs. Since notarization is happening via API the API can block any double-spend attempts thereby allowing for instant transactions

data.name: hdrequired
data.description: Default is 0 (false). If HD account  [  _xPub_ ](types/#xpub)  and  [  HD path ](https://learnmeabitcoin.com/technical/derivation-paths)  information is required by the notary to verify change addresses belong to the sender account

data.name: auxFeeDetails
data.description: Enforce auxiliary fees to every transaction on this asset

data.name: auxfeekeyid
data.description: AuxFee KeyID, the hash160 of the address used where fees are paid out to. Should be P2WPKH

data.name: auxfees
data.description: Details of the auxiliary fees that must be paid for each transaction

data.name: bound
data.description: Lower bound from which the given auxiliary fee percentage begins

data.name: percent
data.description: Percentage fee that must be paid when a transaction's value is above the given bound (percentages are cumulative)

data.name: txOpts
data.description: Transaction options

data.name: rbf
data.description: Replace-by-fee, enables a token to use the high-speed Z-DAG protocol. Should be false for SYS transactions

data.name: memo
data.description: Text message/Memo to be included with the transaction

data.name: memoHeader
data.description: Header of the memo

data.name: assetWhiteList
data.description: Allows UTXOs to be added from assets in the whitelist or the asset being sent

data.name: assetMap
data.description: Mapping of asset GUIDs to their desired outputs

data.name: changeAddress
data.description: The change address where the left over amount should be sent to

data.name: outputs
data.description: An array of outputs containing which address to send the asset to and the value to send

data.name: value
data.description: The amount of the asset to send

data.name: address
data.description: Address to send the asset to

data.name: sysChangeAddress
data.description: Change address if defined is where Syscoin only change outputs are sent to. If not defined and  [  Signer ](utils/#Signer)  is defined then a new change address will be automatically created using the next available change address index in the  [  HD path ](https://learnmeabitcoin.com/technical/derivation-paths)

data.name: sysReceivingAddress
data.description: Address which will hold the new asset. If not defined and  [  Signer ](utils/#Signer)  is defined then a new receiving address will be automatically created using the next available receiving address index in the  [  HD path ](https://learnmeabitcoin.com/technical/derivation-paths)

data.name: feeRate
data.description: Defaults to 10 satoshi per byte. How many satoshi per byte the network fee should be paid out as

data.name: sysFromXpubOrAddress
data.description: If wanting to fund from a specific  [  _xPub_ ](types/#xpub)  or address this field should be set

data.name: utxos
data.description: Pass in specific UTXOs to fund a transaction, should be sanitized using  [  utils.sanitizeBlockbookUTXOs() ](utils/#sanitizeblockbookutxos)

data.name: utxos
data.description: Inputs/outputs of the transaction

data.name: txid
data.description: Transaction ID

data.name: vout
data.description: Output number

data.name: value
data.description: Value being transferred

data.name: height
data.description: Block height

data.name: confirmations
data.description: Number of confirmations

data.name: address
data.description: Address the funds are being/have been sent to

data.name: assetInfo
data.description: Information on an asset included in the UTXO

data.name: assetGuid
data.description: Unique, numeric identifier of the token generated on creation

data.name: value
data.description: Value transferred. Type will be  _BN_  if within a  [  _Res_ ](types/#res)  object,  _String_  if within a  [  _UTXO_ ](types/#utxo)  object

data.name: assets
data.description: Details of any assets involved in the transaction

data.name: assetGuid
data.description: Unique, numeric identifier of the token generated on creation

data.name: contract
data.description: ERC20 address of the contract connected to this SPT for use in the SysEthereum bridge

data.name: symbol
data.description: Token symbol (in base64)

data.name: pubData
data.description: Public data information of the token

data.name: desc
data.description: Base64 encoded string describing the token

data.name: totalSupply
data.description: Total current issued supply

data.name: maxSupply
data.description: Maximum supply in sats

data.name: decimals
data.description: Number of digits of precision for the token

data.name: updateCapabilityFlags
data.description: Update capabilities on this asset

data.name: addressOrXpub
data.description: An address or  [  _xPub_ ](types/#xpub)  to fetch UTXOs for

data.name: redeemOrWitnessScript
data.description: Redeem script for P2SH and witnessScript for P2WSH spending conditions
